text: The Most Seductive Trait

Welcome back to the Otter Half Course where
I teach you everything you need to know in
order to find your other half.

Today I'm going to teach you about the most
seductive trait in the world.

This is something that people of all genders,
all races, and all cultures find attractive.

If you can cultivate this trait you can literally
cause people to become addicted to you.

Now if you think about it - the most common
forms of addiction in modern society are all
related to the internet.

In fact, a study conducted in 2019 found that
we currently spend, on average, 6 and a half
hours every single day surfing the web.

There isn't a single other behavior that we
are so attached to.

But what can we learn from this addiction
of ours?

Well if you look closely - all of the things
on the internet that we get hooked on share
a common trend.

When we surf the web we are exposed to new
videos, new pictures, new people, new music,

new drama, new conversations, new interactions,
new games, new news.
Do you see what I'm getting at?

The greatest addiction in the world is fueled
by novelty.

And this is because we humans are designed
to seek novelty.

It was crucial for our survival back in the
day.

We've evolved to crave novelty because it
incentivized us to explore the world.

To find new foods, new mates, new pieces of
vital information – all things that allowed
our species to survive longer.

And this innate desire for novelty is still
within us today.

It's the main reason why we are so hooked
on the internet.

And that's why novelty is the single most
seductive and addictive trait in the world.

Now at this point in time you're probably
thinking – how exactly do I incorporate
this into my life?
How does one become more novel?

Well, all you have to do is put in the effort
to spice things up every once in a while.

Not everyday or every week, but maybe every
couple of weeks or even every couple of months.

And there are 4 ways that you can go about
doing this.

The first is the most obvious – it's through
visual changes.

This is when you change something about the
way you look.

You can change your clothing, your jewelry,
your hair style, your hair color, the way

you do your makeup, basically anything related
to your looks.

Now this doesn't mean that you have to spend
thousands of dollars on a wardrobe and have
a new outfit for every single day of the week.

You only need to make subtle changes every
once in a while in order to bring visual novelty
into your life.

For example if you always style your hair
one way – then simply trying on a cap or
a beanie would be enough for people to notice.

An even more effective thing you can do is
take care of your body.

If you go to the gym and start eating right
then you will start to see physical changes
in the way you look.

This is a form of novelty as well and it also
makes you more attractive overall.

your life and relationships is by changing
the world around you and the experiences that
come with it.

This is best done by changing the location
of your interactions and also the activities
that you do when you're there.

This is extremely important when it comes
to dates.

Off the top of my head, here are some of the
dates that I've been on in the past year alone.

Playing games at the arcade, bowling, cooking
class, the movies, eating at a restaurant,

partying at the club, making pottery, relaxing
at the spa, the amusement park, fancy night

at the opera, casually walking and talking
in a park, go kart racing, the museum, and
even traveling to another country.

Notice how all of these examples offer a completely
different experience in a completely different
location.

Now this doesn't mean you can only go to the
movies once and then never go again.

Just don't go to the movies 3 weeks in a row
with the same person.

You got to put in some effort to change up
the environment.

Now if you don't have money – that's totally
fine – you just got to be a little bit more
creative.

I remember back in the day when I was broke
- I would bring my girlfriend to Taco Bell

and order something from the dollar menu (cheesy
fiesta potato), or I would bring her to the

park and play on the swings, and I even brought
her to a rooftop high up on a building to
check out the view of the city.

The third way to bring novelty into your life
is by bringing change to your intimacy.

This relates to how you and your partner talk
to each other and also how you make love.

Now I'm not going to dive too much into the
love stuff here.

It's not really PG, so I think I'll make another
video dedicated to just that.

But for now, just keep in mind, that you need
to be spicing up what you do in bed.

You never ever ever want to become too predictable
in bed.

You should also try to change up how you flirt
with your partner.
Don't always give the same type of compliments.

If you tell someone that their the most beautiful
person you've ever seen, every single day!
– it starts to lose it's punch.

You should also change up the frequency of
which you give compliments.

And should learn to show appreciation for
things that you've never shown before.

And finally the last way you can bring novelty
into your life is by changing your personality.

What I mean by this is that you should not
be the same person you were 5 years ago.

You should have some new beliefs about how
the world works, you should have some new

stories under your belt to share, you should
have new things that you are interested in,
you should be growing as a person.

This is primarily done by being open to challenging
your existing beliefs, and being open to experiment
with new ideas.

Luckily for you, the pursuit of self improvement
is all about this – so many of you are probably

already bringing novelty into your life in
this form already.

If you can master the art of novelty by incorporating
it into your life in these 4 ways – then

you will become someone that is always interesting
to interact with.

People who have not seen you in a while will
always wonder what new things you have in
store.

They will crave interacting with you because
it will bring a breath of fresh air into their
life.
Your very essence will become addictive.

Now you don't have to do all 4 of the things
all at once.

Like I said before, you only need to spice
things up every couple of weeks or months.

And when you do, you can just do one or two
of the four things that I mentioned at a time.
Try to do what's natural for you.

If you're someone who doesn't really care
about fashion, but you like big ideas – then

you can express novelty in the form of your
thoughts instead of visuals.

Play on your strengths because it will make
the experience much more enjoyable.
And remember never become too predictable.

This episode was brought to you with the help
of the guys at Audible.

You can bring more novelty into your life
by exposing yourself to more ideas.
And Audible is the perfect place for this.

They have all of the newest best selling non-fiction
titles that you can listen to in your free
time to expand your mind.

the all new Plus Catalog.

This special catalog includes thousands of
Audiobooks, podcasts, Audible Originals, guided

fitness and meditation programs,
sleep tracks for better rest, and much much

more – and it's all included for free when
you become a member.

Go to www.audible.com/improvementpill or text
“improvementpill” to 500-500 to get one

free audiobook, access to the plus catalog
and a 30 day free trial.

Recently I've been listening to “Skin In
The Game” By Nassim Taleb.

Which mainly talks about why you need to have
some skin in the game for the things that
you are trying to pursue.

It's a very interesting read so I highly recommend
you to check it out.
Besides that guys, stay tuned.
